description: Yayoi is a popular English school teacher who is now a happily married housewife to her husband Tatsuya Kubo, a handsome biology teacher who teaches at the same school that she works at; for reasons unknown, she plans to resign from teaching to enjoy her married life with her husband. As a teacher she is well liked and popular among both male and female students and because of her popularity, a school fan club entitled the Ms. Mizuno Fan Club was created by some of her students in her honor.
name: Mizuno Yayoi
